Post: "I missed a celebrity sighting, which means I'm probably going to miss out on every exciting opportunity in life and always be stuck in mediocrity."

Post: "I arrived early at the dentist's office and still got ignored - this just proves that I'm invisible and insignificant in every aspect of my life."
"My dog Roscoe died, which means I'm probably going to be unlucky and miserable in every aspect of my life now, from relationships to career."

Event: Being forced to learn to drive when I'm not good at it.
Post: "I'll never be able to drive and that means I'll always be dependent on others, will never have any real freedom or independence, and my whole life is going to be limited by my inability to do something as simple as driving."

Event: Had strawberries with milk and sugar.
Post: "Had strawberries with milk and sugar, which means I'm probably going to make unhealthy choices in every aspect of my life and never be able to maintain a healthy lifestyle."

Post: "I'm stuck in a long queue, which means my whole day is going to be wasted and I'll probably fall behind on all my tasks and goals."

Post: "I hated my new work picture, which means I'm probably not going to get any promotions or be taken seriously by my colleagues and this will affect my entire career."

Post: "Not being able to breathe this morning means I'm probably going to be sick and weak for the rest of my life, never being able to enjoy outdoor activities or live a healthy lifestyle."

Post: "I melted 2 square inches of my skin and now I'm convinced that I'm careless in every aspect of my life - I'll probably mess up everything from cooking to relationships!"

Post: "Spending too much money at Costco means I'm probably going to be broke and financially irresponsible for the rest of my life."

Event: This day is ugly and it matches my bad mood.
Post: "This day is ugly and it matches my bad mood, which means everything in my life is going to be gloomy and miserable, I'll never find happiness or success."

Post: "We couldn't get the project working with the Windoze laptop, which means our whole team is probably incompetent and will never be able to deliver a successful project, and I'll likely get fired and never find a decent job again."
